description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Discover « TROUBLE WITCHES NEO », horizontal shooting in which cute and comical little witches roam the skies of Xbox LIVE! Sakurako, a traditional Japanese young witch, joins the cast of the Arcade version! The "Story Mode" offers a full voice dubbing in English and in Japanese to enjoy twice the game! The Online Mode featured in "TROUBLE WITCHES NEO" will allow you to play in cooperation with players worldwide, or, at the contrary, to confront them to get the highest score! In addition to the "ARRANGE MODE" with its high quality HD graphics,  you can enjoy two different types of "CHALLENGE MODE" and　the "ARCADE MODE", original version of the game, for a very low price ♪
description.short: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) “TROUBLE WITCHES NEO”, a horizontal shooting game with cute witches, roams the skies of Xbox LIVE! The "STORY MODE" offers a full-voice dubbing in English and Japanese for double the enjoyment! The Online Mode in "TROUBLE WITCHES NEO" will allow you to play with players worldwide, or to confront them for the highest score!
